float32.info: how much the crosshair slows over enemies
float32.name: magnetism_friction

float32.info: how much the crosshair sticks over enemies
float32.name: magnetism_adhesion

float32.info: scales magnetism level for inconsequential targets like infection forms
float32.name: inconsequential_target_scale

float32.info: seconds; time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect
float32.name: look_acceleration_time

float32.info: maximum effect of a pegged look (scales last value in the look function below)
float32.name: look_acceleration_scale

float32.info: 0 - 1 only; magnitude of yaw for pegged acceleration to kick in
float32.name: look_peg_threshold

float32.info: 1 is fast, 0 is none, over 1 is probably really fast
float32.name: look_auto_leveling_scale

int16.info: amount of time player needs to hold ACTION to pick up a weapon
int16.name: minimum_weapon_swap_ticks

int16.info: amount of time player needs to move without looking up/down before autoleveling kicks in
int16.name: minimum_auto_leveling_ticks

float32.info: radians; 0 means vehicle's up vector is along the ground, 90 means it's straight up
float32.name: minimum_angle_for_vehicle_flipping

float32.info: the end bounds of a chunk; beginning bounds of each is 1.0 / total chunk count, times the chunk's number, starting with 0 and ending with 1
float32.name: scale

float32.info: 0 - 1 only; 1.0 prevents movement while stunned
float32.name: stun_movement_penalty

float32.info: 0 - 1 only; 1.0 prevents turning while stunned
float32.name: stun_turning_penalty

float32.info: 0 - 1 only; 1.0 prevents jumping while stunned
float32.name: stun_jumping_penalty

float32.info: seconds; all stunning damage will last at least this long
float32.name: minimum_stun_time

float32.info: seconds; all stunning damage will last at most this long
float32.name: maximum_stun_time

float32.info: 0 - 1 only
float32.name: first_person_skip_fraction

float32.info: world units
float32.name: harmful_falling_distance_from

float32.info: world units
float32.name: harmful_falling_distance_to

float32.info: world units
float32.name: maximum_falling_distance

float32.info: 0 - 1 only; tested by 002. 0 = Death from TOUCHING the ground, 1 = No impact fall damage
float32.name: falling_damage_sensitivity

float32.info: 0 - 1 only; tested by 002. 0 or less = Almost no falling impact damage, 0.21 = Normal, 0.5 = 2/3 shields lost from large falls, 1 = Twice as much damage as 0
float32.name: falling_distance_damage_modifier

float32.info: fraction of original velocity parallel to the ground after one tick
float32.name: vehicle_terrain_parameters_ground_friction_scale

float32.info: cosine of angle at which friction falls off
float32.name: vehicle_terrain_parameters_ground_friction_normal_k1_scale

float32.info: cosine of angle at which friction is zero
float32.name: vehicle_terrain_parameters_ground_friction_normal_k0_scale

float32.info: depth in the ground at which a point mass rests
float32.name: vehicle_terrain_parameters_ground_depth_scale

float32.info: fraction of original velocity perpendicular to the ground after one tick
float32.name: vehicle_terrain_parameters_ground_damp_fraction_scale

float32.name: density

float32.info: scales initial velocity
float32.name: velocity_scale_from

float32.name: velocity_scale_to
